title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 121.14 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 121.14 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or its application to any
person or circumstances is adjudged invalid by a court of competent
jurisdiction, such judgment shall not affected or impair the validity of the
other provisions of this Part or their application to other persons and
circumstances, and those remaining provisions shall not be affected but shall
remain in full force and effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
121.14

Adopted

New

York State Register January 29, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 04, eff. 1/29/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
